column5: I've been away for a while, and most things slip easily out of the senile guys mind  Wold someone direct me to the area to load photos, or a quick tutorial  Thanks for a senile oldy

Go to Photobucket.Com - That's what I use.   Free to sign-up... easy to upload pictures. Once the pictures are uploaded, Click the picture and grab its "IMG CODE"... and post it to OFC post...  Others use other websites, and I'm sure they'll give their input as well...
Hi ya John.Hope alls well with you and Dianne. If you like,I can drop by and hook you up.  Pm if you like.
